attributes.action: Reintroduce the weekly collection of household waste by all local authorities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since local authorities were encouraged
to collect household refuse every two weeks a very noticable difference in the ammount of rubbish fly tipped,illegally dumped or just left lying about has occured.This policy is niether saving moneys or helping to create a more green issues awareness.It is just creating a health hazzard time bomb

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
